Synopsis: Formats input objects for display in a stream-oriented manner.
Description: The Format-Stream function formats input objects for display in a stream-oriented manner. It provides flexibility in displaying data in various streams such as Output, Host, Warning, Verbose, Debug, and Information.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Get-Process | Format-Stream -Property Name, Id -Stream Host
Displays the Name and Id properties of the processes in the Host stream.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code:
Get-Service | Format-Stream -ExcludeProperty Status -List
Displays all service properties except Status as a list.
